title: Solo
description: Evie Silver appears to have it all. A semi-celebrity in the British tabloids, she’s known asmuch for her fame as a “lite” classical musician as for her own fabulous sense of style.But this self-made diva is dissatisfied with her stale, safe marriage to her collegesweetheart and her artistically shallow career. An extended trip to New York seems justthe thing, but Evie’s problems in London make the transatlantic journey with themedia demands on an emerging pop starlet; the increasing threats of a determined stalker; and a long kept secret that could ruin her image and all of the relationships she holdsdear.
author: Emily Barr
